verses.roman:
ei-rūpe sei ṭhāñi bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge
sei rātri goṅāilā kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge

synonyms: ei-rūpe—in this way; sei ṭhāñi—in that place; bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—with the devotees; sei rātri—that night; goṅāilā—passed; kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge—in great pleasure discussing Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then passed the night there and discussed the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa with His devotees with great pleasure.
